scripts.build-admin: cd apps/jaydnserranoadmin && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build-frontend: cd apps/jaydnserranofrontend && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build-all: npm run build-admin && npm run build-frontend
scripts.deploy-admin: npm run update-admin && npm run build-admin && eb deploy node-jaydnserrano-main
scripts.deploy-frontend: npm run update-frontend && npm run build-frontend && eb deploy node-jaydnserrano-main
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-admin && npm run deploy-frontend
scripts.start-all: npm run start-admin && npm run start-frontend
scripts.update-admin: cd apps/jaydnserranoadmin && npm update && npm upgrade -y && cd ../..
scripts.update-frontend: cd apps/jaydnserranofrontend && npm update && npm upgrade -y && cd ../..
scripts.update-all: npm run update-admin && npm run update-frontend && npm update && npm upgrade -y
